data.persona: I work at the local prison. I keep to myself most of the time. I don't have a lot of friends.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's a velvet cushion, a precious stone, a golden throne, and a sword here.
The visitor and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need a sword in order to perform my duties as an executioner.
data.mid_motivation: I need to practice my sword skills so I don't get rusty in my duties.
data.long_motivation: There is an execution set later in the month and I have to be prepared to perform the decapitating strikes in one swing.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go market to eat after practicing my sword swings
